Scoring darts has never been easier. Dart Scorer Cricket and X01 allows you to keep track of your cricket, X01, Around The Clock and Shanghai game scores. Play with 2, 3 and 4 players or play on your own against our Score Bot AI to perfect your dart throwing skills. 

Use AirPlay and Apple TV to project a completely custom score board (unique from your iPhone screen) for all players to follow along with the game score and stats.

Matches are saved so you can start as many different dart games as you like and come back to them later. 

Cricket:
* Up to 4 players in standard cricket, cut-throat and no points modes.
* Play single player Cricket against Score Bot, our dart throwing AI, with easy, medium and hard difficulty levels.
* Stats for marks per round saved for each match and every player.

X01:
* Up to 4 players in X01 with 101, 301, 501, 701, 901 and 1001 modes.
* Play single player X01 against Score Bot, our dart throwing AI, with easy, medium and hard difficulty levels.
* X01 options include straight in, double in or triple in for first throw. 
* X01 options include straight out, double out or triple out for close out.
* X01 scoring suggestions appear directly on the dart board. The recommended target will appear bright green.

Around The Clock:
* Up to 4 players in Around The Clock 
* Custom option to end on 20 or on bullseye

Shanghai:
* Up to 4 players in Shanghai
* Play 7, 10, 15 or 20 round Shanghai.

Game Features:
* Save matches and game history with support for multiple games in progress. 
* Intuitive scoring system with 3D touch support for clean and simple UI.
* Detailed match history allows you to transfer games to league scoresheets.
* Track misses and any non-scoring dart throws.
* Track player progress with win %, matches played, marks per round (cricket), points per dart (x01) and 3 dart average (x01) history for all games played.
* Eliminates math error with score totals.
* Leading player name turns gold to easily see who is winning.
* X01 Score Assistant helps you decide where to aim. 
* Get further assistance using our 3-Dart and 2-Dart checkout tables.
* Undo button allows you to fix any mistakes.
* Score dart throws with your voice. Simply tap and hold the microphone button and speak your scores and we will enter them automatically.
* In-game commentary nudges players when it's their turn to throw and awards you with positive feedback when you do well.
* Add/edit players and track player progress.
* Upload player avatars.
* Completed match screen shows player rank and number of darts thrown by winning player.
* View in-game stats including Marks Per Round for cricket games and Points per dart & 3 Dart Avg for X01 games.
* View player stats including Marks Per Round for cricket and Points Per Dart for X01. Player stats can be filtered based on opponent.
* View Dart game match results that include Marks Per Round for cricket games and Points Per Dart for X01 games.
* Customize your experience with game options, custom sound effects and themes.
* iPad Pro and iPhone X support.

How to score:
* Single, double or triple tap a dart button to score a single, double or triple respectively, or long press a dart button to score.
* Tap the miss button to record a miss.
* Tap the next (forward arrow) button to move to the next players turn.
* Tap the undo (back arrow) button to undo the last throw.
* Tap the reset button to restart the current game.
* Or, you can tap and hold the microphone button to speak your score. For example, you can say things like "Double 19, Triple 16, Miss", then release the microphone button to apply the score.

Additional Info and Feedback:
* View Rules of each game from within the app by going to Settings > Game Rules
* Help us improve Dart Scorer Cricket and X01 by going to Settings > Leave Feedback

Ledlenser Connect enables you to remotely control and customize your Ledlenser light with Bluetooth®.  The app allows you to customize your light's settings and create custom profiles with the right light for your applications. Timers allow you to configure when the light will switch on and off. 

Compatible with MH11/iH11R, Wireless Remote Control Type A and ML6 Connect WL.

Wireless Remote Control and Direct Control: 
Remotely operate your Ledlenser with the Connect app or with the Wireless Remote Control Type A (if compatible). This will help you to have the correct light for any situation, even when your Ledlenser is out of reach, e.g. when hanging in the tent or under the ceiling.  

Personalize your light settings: 
Use the app to quickly and easily combine light functions that are suitable for your applications. In up to eight different profiles, you can create and store settings for your activities such as hiking, camping, DIY and working in the dark. Each profile allows you to configure up to six light features, such as light intensity, color, or additional functions such as Optisense (depending on your lamp). After sending the profile to the lamp, these features can then be set directly using the switch of the lamp – even without smartphone.

Light at the right time: 
This function allows you to define when the light switches on or off. So you can use the light to wake you up or to have the light switch off after a certain amount of time to save battery power, for example if you fall asleep. You can also choose whether the light should gradually dim as it switches off and gradually become brighter when it switches on - to wake you gently, for example. 

Keep an eye on time thanks to blinking
Sometimes it is important to keep an eye on time - for example during interval training or certain jobs in the dark. It helps not having to look at your watch. You can program your Ledlenser to blink after a certain period (interval) to alert you a specific amount of time has passed. The activated light thereby will be shortly interrupted. E.g. when a 10 minutes interval has been set, the light would be shortly interrupted every 10 minutes. In addition, the smart blink function can indicate the number of intervals which have passed. E.g. at a 10 minutes interval with smart blink, the light would be shortly interrupted one time after 10 minutes, then two times shortly interrupted after 20 minutes (= perceived as two times shortly blinking) and so on.

Battery Status
When connected, the Connect app will show you the current battery status of your Ledlenser in %.

SOS function: 
In emergencies, the SOS button emits an international distress signal. In addition, the ML6 Connect WL features the Alpine Distress Signal. This is for instance helpful when you’re without cell phone reception in the mountains and need the mountain patrol. 

Service/FAQs/Troubleshoting:
https://www.ledlenser.com/support/


NEW FUNCTIONS:
The app contains new functions for a better user experience. New Ledlenser products are compatible with the Ledlenser Connect app.

— Общайтесь, делитесь эмоциями, спорьте на любые актуальные темы в чатах и комментариях. Соревнуйтесь в остроумии, но уважайте мнение других.

— В новых релизах вы сможете подписаться только на интересующие вас темы, а мы сформируем для вас умную ленту на основе ваших предпочтений.

А именно: 

— Выберите любимых игроков. Их новости, статистика и карьера будут всегда под рукой.

— Выберите любимые команды. Мы расскажем все о трансферах, слухах, матчах и новостях.

— Выберите любимые турниры. С нас - подробное освещение главных спортивных событий в 2022 году.

Чем еще мы можем порадовать вас:

— Прямые трансляции. Признаемся, что тут все сложно. К сожалению, мы не можем показывать вам матчи в нашем приложении. Но вы точно найдете текстовые онлайн трансляции главных матчей, видео голов и опасных моментов из УПЛ, Лиги чемпионов, других турниров и видов спорта.

— Цифры, цифры и еще раз цифры. Самые внимательные из вас могут найти пробелы в нашей статистике, но мы постоянно работаем над ее полнотой и актуальностью.

— С нами удобно следить за результатами матчей, даже если вы уехали в командировку, путешествуете в другой стране или просто укатили на выходные на дачу. Подпишитесь на стартовые составы, время начала матчей, карточки, голы, и мы с радостью завалим вас уведомлениями об этих событиях. 

— Вы сможете бесплатно размещать свой контент и взаимодействовать с другими пользователям, но нужно выполнить лишь одно условие — авторизоваться в самом приложении. Мы предусмотрели разные варианты, выбирайте наиболее удобный для вас. 

Кстати, не забывайте смотреть видосы на наших Youtube-каналах:

— ТАЙК МАЙСОН

M PERFORMANCE SOUND PLAYER

With the introduction of the M Performance Exhaust Sound Player, BMW M Performance is offering the opportunity to experience the great sound, quality and performance of the M Performance Sport Exhaust on popular media platforms. 
BMW stands for sporty and agile vehicles. In order to meet the high demands of our motorsport enthusiast, the M Performance development team has created race inspired Sport Exhaust Systems, Adjustable Sport Exhausts and for diesel motors, the new Active Sound Design Exhaust. M Performance is bringing the best of motorsport exhaust sounds directly to the street.
This M Performance Exhaust Player App includes a number of tools and features. Real time comparisons with stock exhaust sounds are a click away.


Key Features

o HQ SoundFiles
High resolution sound files of M Performance and stock exhaust systems

o PowerDrive
Sounds through the entire engine load cycle and gear changes

Real time comparisons between M Performance and stock exhaust sounds
